page.title: 21Bedford North
page.content:
Well a lot has changed. Bedford is now bigger - lots more housing. Bedford College of Higher Education became DeMontfort University and is now The University of Bedfordshire. The Tower block remains - but lots of new student accommodation has been been built. The Norse Road area has a crematoriam and two new housing estates - one of which we live on. There are sill many open spaces and lovely parks. The pond at Bedford Park remains and next to it is a childrens' play area.
.
